Icons

Additional Classes

We provide additional classes for icons as helpers

Name Height Class Preview Example
Small 12 px icon-sm <i class="icon mdi-action-accessibility icon-sm"></i>
Medium 16 px icon-md <i class="icon mdi-action-accessibility icon-md"></i>
Large 20 px icon-lg <i class="icon mdi-action-accessibility icon-lg"></i>
X Large 30 px icon-xl <i class="icon mdi-action-accessibility icon-xl"></i>
XX Large 50 px icon-xxl <i class="icon mdi-action-accessibility icon-xxl"></i>
